items.ja: How Liverpool wrestled Ngumoha away from Chelsea
items.en: How Liverpool wrestled Ngumoha away from Chelsea
items.text_for_match: How Liverpool wrestled Ngumoha away from Chelsea Sixteen-year-old sensation Rio Ngumoha is the talk of English football after his last-minute winner for Liverpool, but why did he leave Chelsea? Sixteen-year-old sensation Rio Ngumoha is the talk of English football after his last-minute winner for Liverpool, but why did he leave Chelsea?

items.ja: Vazquez joins Leverkusen after Real Madrid exit
items.en: Vazquez joins Leverkusen after Real Madrid exit
items.text_for_match: Vazquez joins Leverkusen after Real Madrid exit Former Spain international Lucas Vazquez has joined Bayer Leverkusen on a free transfer after his contract at Real Madrid expired in the summer. Former Spain international Lucas Vazquez has joined Bayer Leverkusen on a free transfer after his contract at Real Madrid expired in the summer.

items.ja: Dortmund sign Chelsea's Chukwuemeka in £24m deal
items.en: Dortmund sign Chelsea's Chukwuemeka in £24m deal
items.text_for_match: Dortmund sign Chelsea's Chukwuemeka in £24m deal England youth international Carney Chukwuemeka, who was on loan from Chelsea at Borussia Dortmund last season, joins the German club on a permanent deal. England youth international Carney Chukwuemeka, who was on loan from Chelsea at Borussia Dortmund last season, joins the German club on a permanent deal.
